data: Koiné alfabetica fra Siracusa, Megara Iblea e Selinunte?
M.T. Manni Piraino, «Koiné alfabetica fra Siracusa, Megara Iblea e Selinunte?», Kokalos 21 (1975): 121–53
The text is set out across one face of the abacus, which is 16 cm high.

Opus signinum inscription of Gnaius Modius

Letters neatly formed of small black basalt stone chips. Nu has a shorter right hand vertical; omicron is equal size to the other letters; alpha off vertical, cross-bar formed by single piece; mu formed by four equal off-vertical strokes, mid-point descending fully to the base-line.
L'année épigraphique: revue des publications épigraphiques relatives a l'antiquité romaine., 1888-
